DOC.criteria: Subjects must genotype 1 CHC evidence HCV infection least 6 month screen Subjects must treatmentnaïve received prior treatment interferon , immunomodulatory agent , DAA HCV Evidence cirrhosis History clinical evidence significant unstable cardiac disease Any cause significant liver disease addition hepatitis C Creatinine clearance ≤50 mL/min use CockcroftGault equation screen Female subject pregnant nursing
